title: Moderna probes reports of COVID-19 vaccine contamination in Japan
author: Kevin Dunleavy
description: It's been a relatively smooth ride for Moderna's global COVID-19 vaccine roll out. But on Wednesday, the company said it's investigating the possible contamination of one batch sent to Japan. | It's been a relatively smooth ride for Moderna's global COVID-19 vaccine roll out. But on Wednesday, the company said it's investigating the possible contamination of one batch sent to Japan. Moderna said it is focusing its probe on its manufacturing partner in Spain, CDMO Rovi.
